metadata.description: Somatosensory reflex pathways translating tactile, thermal, nociceptive, and proprioceptive inputs into action.
metadata.notes: Provides qualitative loop descriptions without redundant biomimetic actuator data.

tactile_withdrawal.stimulus: Unexpected tactile threat such as sharp edge contact.
tactile_withdrawal.afferent: A-delta mechanonociceptors to dorsal horn interneurons.
tactile_withdrawal.efferent: Flexor motor pools with reciprocal inhibition of extensors.
tactile_withdrawal.effector: Limb withdrawal from point of contact.

temperature_regulation.stimulus: Skin thermoreceptor detection of extreme heat or cold.
temperature_regulation.afferent: A-delta and C thermoreceptors to lamina I neurons.
temperature_regulation.integration: Spinal interneurons and hypothalamic relays adjusting autonomic outflow.
temperature_regulation.effector: Cutaneous vasodilation, sweating, or shivering depending on stimulus.

nociceptor_guarding.afferent: C-fiber input ascending via spinoreticular pathways.
nociceptor_guarding.integration: Spinal-brainstem loops amplifying protective muscle co-contraction.
nociceptor_guarding.efferent: Gamma and alpha motor neuron activation of surrounding musculature.

proprioceptive_correction.stimulus: Joint angle deviation sensed by muscle spindles and Golgi organs.
proprioceptive_correction.afferent: Group Ia, II, and Ib fibers to dorsal columns and spinal interneurons.
proprioceptive_correction.integration: Spinal-cerebellar feedback calibrating motor neuron output.
proprioceptive_correction.efferent: Targeted activation of agonists and antagonists to restore alignment.
proprioceptive_correction.effector: Fine-tuned adjustments maintaining precise limb position.
